sheet_name_field.description: the property name in the sheets/quadrangle geojson file to use as a unique identifier of every sheet location.

download_timeout.description: 2-element array with connect timeout, read timeout

osm_query.default: [out:json]; ( nwr ({{bbox}}) [water=lake];  nwr ({{bbox}}) [water=reservoir];  way ({{bbox}}) [natural=water] [name];  way ({{bbox}}) [type=waterway] [name];  way ({{bbox}}) [waterway=river] [name]; way ({{bbox}}) [waterway=canal] [name]; way ({{bbox}}) [water=river]; way ({{bbox}}) [waterway=stream] [name]; way ({{bbox}}) [natural=coastline]; way ({{bbox}}) [waterway=ditch]; way ({{bbox}}) [waterway=drain]; way ({{bbox}}) [waterway=riverbank]; ); out body; >; out skel qt;

resizing_index_building.description: area looks good for downscaling, cubic looks good or upscaling
